statement.name: findAlbums
statement.sql: SELECT a.name AS albumname, track_count AS track_count, artist_count AS artist_count, a.artist AS artist, COUNT(i.hash) AS imagecount FROM album a INNER JOIN track t ON a.name = t.album LEFT OUTER JOIN image i ON i.hash = t.image_hash WHERE ((:artist IS NULL AND :genre IS NULL AND (:index < 0 OR :index > 8)) OR (:artist IS NOT NULL AND a.name IN (SELECT DISTINCT(album) FROM track WHERE LOWER(artist) = LOWER(:artist))) OR (:genre IS NOT NULL AND a.name IN (SELECT DISTINCT(album) FROM track WHERE LOWER(genre) = LOWER(:genre))) OR {letterRegionByIndex}) AND (:filter IS NULL OR LOWER(a.name) LIKE :filter) GROUP BY a.name, a.track_count, a.artist_count, a.artist ORDER BY albumname
